subtab.title: Subscriptions
subtab.description: Here you will find useful configuration for subscriptions

subscriptions.lineStatusChange.title: Subscription Line Status Change
subscriptions.lineStatusChange.description: Select one of these status change options to define what the website user is allowed to change for a subscription line item.

subscriptions.allowToCancelSuspendRequir.title: Allow the user to cancel / suspend required lines
subscriptions.allowToCancelSuspendRequir.description: Check this box if you want to allow the website user to cancel/suspend required subscription lines.

subscriptions.generalStatusChange.title: Subscription General Status Change
subscriptions.generalStatusChange.description: Select one of these status change options to define what the website user is allowed to change for a subscription. This option affects the entire subscription.

subscriptions.disallowUpgradeQuantity.title: Disallow the user to upgrade quantity
subscriptions.disallowUpgradeQuantity.description: Check this box if you do not want the website user to be able to increase the quantity of a subscription line.

subscriptions.disallowDowngradeQuantity.title: Disallow the user to downgrade quantity
subscriptions.disallowDowngradeQuantity.description: Check this box if you do not want the website user to be able to decrease the quantity of a subscription line.
